edu_1.description: Educational data, set 1: Open University and Oxford University

queries.description: Give me the URIs and names of all course modules
Give me the URIs, names and codes of all course modules (may vary in interpretation)
queries.original: PREFIX aiiso: <http://purl.org/vocab/aiiso/schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?mod ?title ?code WHERE { ?mod a aiiso:Module . ?mod <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> ?title . ?mod aiiso:code ?code }

queries.description: Also give me the regulations of all course modules (example where properties are preserved)
This and the previous one are examples of two equivalent source queries that have the same expected query

egov_1.description: Open Government Data: UK and Switzerland

queries.description: Tell me everything about all the administrative districts.
Tell me the codes of all the administrative districts.
List the labels and identifiers of all local authorities.
List the labels and denominations of all schools.
List the identifiers and descriptions of all administrative services.

arts_1.description: Art: Museum of Fine Arts Budapest & Artium

queries.description: List types and descriptions of all catalogued physical art objects
queries.original: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?physicalThing ?hasType ?descr WHERE { ?physicalThing a ecrm:E18_Physical_Thing . ?physicalThing ecrm:P2_has_type ?hasType . ?physicalThing ecrm:P1_is_identified_by ?id . ?id ecrm:P3_has_note ?descr }
expected: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?physicalThing ?hasType ?descr WHERE { ?physicalThing a ecrm:E24_Physical_Man-Made_Thing . ?physicalThing ecrm:P2_has_type ?hasType . ?physicalThing ecrm:P3_has_note ?descr }

queries.description: List who created what
queries.original: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?creation ?partecipant WHERE { ?creation a ecrm:E65_Creation . ?creation ecrm:P11_had_participant ?partecipant }
expected: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?creation ?partecipant WHERE { ?creation a ecrm:E65_Creation . ?creation ecrm:P14_carried_out_by ?partecipant }

queries.description: List the periods in which people died (this is a case of the expected query matching the given one)
queries.original: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?deathEntity ?deathTimeSpan WHERE {?deathEntity a ecrm:E69_Death . ?deathEntity ecrm:P4_has_time-span ?deathTimeSpan }
expected: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?deathEntity ?deathTimeSpan WHERE {?deathEntity a ecrm:E69_Death . ?deathEntity ecrm:P4_has_time-span ?deathTimeSpan }

queries.description: List the death dates of people
queries.original: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?deathEntity ?deathDate WHERE {?deathEntity a ecrm:E69_Death .?deathEntity ecrm:P4_has_time-span ?deathTimeSpan . ?deathTimeSpan ecrm:P78_is_identified_by ?deathTimeSpanID . ?deathTimeSpanID ecrm:P3_has_note ?deathDate }
expected: PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/> SELECT DISTINCT ?deathEntity ?deathDate WHERE { ?deathEntity a ecrm:E69_Death . ?deathEntity ecrm:P4_has_time-span ?deathTimeSpan . ?deathTimeSpan ecrm:P78_is_identified_by ?deathTimeSpanID . ?deathTimeSpanID ecrm:P3_has_note ?deathDate }

queries.description: List the labels and variants of all the topics in the dataset (another example of the expected query being the same, but with a different vocabulary)
queries.original: PREFIX mads: <http://www.loc.gov/mads/rdf/v1#> SELECT DISTINCT ?topic ?authoritativeLabel ?variant WHERE { ?topic a mads:Topic .?topic mads:authoritativeLabel ?authoritativeLabel . ?topic mads:hasVariant ?variant }
expected: PREFIX mads: <http://www.loc.gov/mads/rdf/v1#> SELECT DISTINCT ?topic ?authoritativeLabel ?hasVariant WHERE { ?topic a mads:Topic . ?topic mads:authoritativeLabel ?authoritativeLabel . ?topic mads:hasVariant ?hasVariant }

edu_2.description: Educational data, set 2: Open University and Aalto University

queries.description: List the URIs and descriptions of all video podcasts (course material)
List people with name and surname
Metadata about course materials - note it is not semantically equivalent due to publisher/published but it is the closest satisfiable query
queries.original: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT DISTINCT ?thing ?info ?published ?anotherThing WHERE { ?thing dc:published ?published . ?thing <http://digitalbazaar.com/media/download> ?info . ?thing dc:isPartOf ?anotherThing }
expected: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT DISTINCT ?thing ?info ?published ?anotherThing WHERE { ?thing dc:isPartOf ?anotherThing . ?thing dc:publisher ?published . ?thing dc:title ?info }

queries.description: Data about catalogue patents
queries.original: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?patent ?label ?date ?title ?creator ?status ?authorList WHERE { ?patent a bibo:Patent . ?patent <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?label . ?patent dc:date ?date .?patent dc:title ?title .?patent dc:creator ?creator . ?patent bibo:status ?status . ?patent bibo:authorList ?authorList }
expected: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?patent ?label ?date ?title ?creator ?status ?authorList WHERE { ?patent a bibo:Patent . ?patent dc:date ?date . ?patent dc:title ?title . ?patent bibo:authorList ?authorList }

queries.description: Names and postcodes of campus buildings
List the URIs and labels of all places
List the collections that belong to another collection, and describe the collections they belong to
List the URIs and labels of all concepts in the museum thesauri
